Package hac.filters

package hac.filters
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    hac
     
    hac.beans

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    FinishGameFilter
    The Filter makes sure that after the user has finished the game and the finish page displayed, he will be removed from the room.
    GameFilter
    The filter was meant to handle situation that a player sent an "in game related" rest and the room is not full but because of an error discovered too close to the submission deadline, we decided to disable the filter's functionality.
    InRoomFilter
    The filter makes sure that if a player (which means a user inside a room) enters pages that aren't in game related, he will be removed from its room.
    OnRoomFilter
    Filter to /game/init - handle with many kinds of situations that can happen when getting to this route.
